To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ThreeBlackCrows _threeblackcrows;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_threeblackcrows = ThreeBlackCrows(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_threeblackcrows.IsReady)
{
    var period = _threeblackcrows.Period.Value;
    var current = _threeblackcrows.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.threeblackcrows = self.ThreeBlackCrows(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.threeblackcrows.IsReady:
    period = self.threeblackcrows.Period.Value
    current = self.threeblackcrows.Current.Value
